meanings.definition: The highest point or peak of something.
meanings.sent1: The fastigiums of the mountain were covered in snow.
meanings.sent2: The hiker reached the fastigiums of the hill after a long climb.
meanings.sent3: The fastigiums of the cake were adorned with colorful candles.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams reached the fastigiums of success.
meanings.sent5: The fastigiums of the skyscraper touched the clouds.

meanings.definition: The point on the top of the skull where the sagittal and coronal sutures intersect.
meanings.sent1: The doctor pointed to the fastigiums on the skull model.
meanings.sent2: The fastigiums on the skull are important landmarks for surgeons.
meanings.sent3: The fastigiums on the skull looked like a tiny crossroads.
meanings.sent4: Her finger traced the fastigiums on the skull during the anatomy class.
meanings.sent5: The fastigiums on the skull felt slightly bumpy to the touch.
